org.microbean.configuration.cdi

Class ConfigurationsExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microbean.configuration.cdi.ConfigurationsExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Extension

    public class ConfigurationsExtension
extends Object
implements Extension
    An Extension that adapts the configuration ecosystem exposed by the Configurations class to CDI constructs.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    Configurations
